attributes.action: Not introduce ban / restrictions on photography
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not introduce ban/ restrictions on photography in public spaces. I am a painter. It is vital to my practice to take photographs, make drawings & notes often in urban spaces. It is vital that artists are able to interpret & reinterpret urban spaces as they change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
